Hi Mike. Good to hear from you. He's yours...

DANG you guys are quick!!

I saw this new thread just before passing out last night and woke up ready to make some purchases ....... i guess i better keep my trigger finger warm around here!!
12 hours and they all gone :(
Man the speaker is beautiful. I'll take it if it is still available, just please send me your paypal address. Thanks!

Hi Doug,
PM sent. He's yours.....
